venue.address_1: 107 South St, Ste 6A (btw South Station & Chinatown)
venue.name: David Buck's Loft

item.description:
Law of Attraction is about “like attracts like”.

When you are wholly balanced ..body, mind & spirit in harmony...you are a powerful "attractor". One of the fastest & most effective ways to attract more of what you want is to make sure your Chakras…the 7 main energy centers in your body… are aligned & in sync.

For example, if you think good thoughts & feel happy sometimes but easily fatigued & financially or spiritually "depleted", then you are out of sync & possibly “blocked/stuck”. This impacts what you attract into your life.

Kristina Nichols, Boston LOA member, psychotherapist & personal development coach, will be your guide to learn how to
- clear any blockages &
- tune in, tap in and turn on

each of the 7 Chakras to be vibrationally aligned with your heart’s desires.

***************************************************

About Kristina Nichols, LMHC
email: knichols09@gmail.com

Kristina is a Licensed Mental Health Counselor & Personal Development Coach with over 14 years of experience. Specializing in the practice of meditation, guided visualizations, & self-care techniques, Kristina is passionate & committed to helping others achieve their goals and live a balanced & fulfilling life.

She received her Master of Arts degree in Clinical Mental Health Counseling with a specialization in Holistic Studies from Lesley University. She is trained in Stress Reduction & Relaxation Techniques from the Herbert Benson Mind/Body Medical Institutes’ Education Initiatives & Lesley University.

***************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

***************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and click "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: How to tune in, tap in & turn on your Chakras to align with Law Of Attraction
